go_data.justification: Orco is an olfactory coreceptor that binds to odorants.
Orco is involved in the detection of odorants in the olfactory system.

go_data.term: detection of chemical stimulus involved in sensory perception
go_data.justification: Orco is involved in the detection of chemical stimuli in the olfactory system.
Orco is expressed in the antennae of insects.
